about_the_game:
This pack contains a variety of characters set in a futuristic setting. This set focuses on people interacting with technology and drones.

This token pack includes:

  • 22 unique drones
  • Dwarf Hacker
  • Elf Rigger
  • Human Hacker
  • Ork Rigger
  • 3 Troll Hackers (2M/1F)
  • Dwarf Rigger
  • Business Hacker
  • Elf hacker
  • Human Rigger
  • Ork Rigger

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

name: Fantasy Grounds - Shadowpunk (Token Pack)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
